description:
Hate your 9-5 job or want to make extra cash? Forget about multi-level marketing or any other get rich scheme that one friend keeps bugging you about.

Upwork is a freelancing platform with more than 1 BILLION dollars in jobs awarded every year. And no, I don't get a commission when you sign up :-). In this course I will show you how to start from square one and become a superstar on Upwork. Freelancing through Upwork has allowed me to earn a really nice income working from almost ANYWHERE at almost ANYTIME and if I can do it, so can you.

I will walk you through setting up your profile the RIGHT WAY, finding and landing the best clients with the most lucrative jobs, and building your freelancing business on the Upwork platform.

This course has over 1.5 hours in content. I did my best to keep every lesson short, actionable, and to the point. I hope you enjoy it and I hope you apply what you learn and become a Freelance Superstar!
title: Upwork- Guide to becoming a Freelance Superstar in 2016
